name: Dreamy Runner
description:
Dreamy Runner is an endless runner where you play as a girl running in her dreams.

This is Game Jam game I made for the Mini Jam 105: Dreamy with the limitation of Every Playthrough is Unique.

My game follows the theme of Dreamy with the concept because of the dream land the player runs in.

It follows the limitation of Every Playthrough is Unique by spawning different obstacles/coins randomly.

Thanks for playing!
